QuestData.Title: Gadgets and Gizmos Aplenty
QuestData.Description: The militia may have given up on us, but we haven't given up on me!$b$bI'm a bit of a tinker, and I find that my harvest golems are better than any hired help I've ever had. They just need regular maintenance to keep running.$b$bOf course the Briarback are now taking over my fields, and my farmhands have gone into disrepair.$b$bIf you head out into the fields, can you grab the inner mechanisms from any of them that you find? That will stop them from exploding as well as help me plan my revenge.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the parts yet?
QuestData.RewardText: Perfect! With these parts I can rebuild my entire workforce. Or make one of them REALLY powerful.
